name: Cosmetologycampus.com
tag_list: cosmetology-ce, cosmetology-school-online, cosmeology-license, texas-cosmetology-license, illinois-cosmetology-license, wisconsin-cosmetology-ce
overview:
cosmetologycampus.com™ powered by 360training, is the leading online provider of continuing education for the Cosmetology Industry.

Since 1997, 360training has provided best of breed computer/web-based courses used for a wide range of workforce and adult education purposes in government regulated industries including cosmetology, real estate, insurance/financial services, occupational safety, funeral industry, and hospitality/food/beverage.

Our Cosmetology Continuing Education courses are designed by authoritative experts to deliver fast and efficient results that empower our customers to achieve a higher level of success through:

24X7 anytime, anywhere accessibility of accredited online training
Quality instructional content validated by industry experts
Interactive multimedia courses to keep learners engaged
Cutting-edge management technologies that drive bottom line success
Dedicated customer support, 7-days per week

cosmetologycampus.com™ offers a complete catalog of self-paced, online continuing education courses as a full suite of innovative e-learning management tools to help organizations achieve greater success.

If you are looking for other types of training, check out the training-classes.com directory of construction training seminars
